root: ^Keep running! We just have to make it to the edge of the woods.
^W-wait! Guys, let's take a break. I really can't r-run anymore. I think we've made it far enough away.
^Ah, okay Liam. Everyone take a breath, he's still small so this is harder on him.
^You're right. Let's stop here for now.

^Hmmm... I'd rate that experience pretty low for a team bonding experience, but we made it, at least. I feel like now would be the time to finally exchange the friendship bracelets we made. Would that make you feel better, Liam?
^Hahaha. Maybe. Yes! I worked really hard on mine. You still have them, right?
^I do-- Ah! Ah, I'm not-- I'm not feeling... good...
^YOUR BODY IS STARTING TO EAT ITSELF. THE HUNGER. THE HUNGER IS UNBEARABLE. IT'S TIME TO FINISH WHAT YOU STARTED. DO IT NOW. DO IT NOW. DO ITNOW DOITNOW DOITNOWDOITNOWDOITNOW
^Oh my god. Are you okay? What did he do to you? That sick freak!

good: ^YES. THE BRACELETS. YOUR HAND WRAPS AROUND THE FOUR OF THEM, STILL IN YOUR POCKET. WEAR THEM. FEAST.

c-0: ^NO. NO! THE HUNGER. IT WILL KILL YOU! YOU HAVE MADE A STUPID CHOICE.
c-1: ^No.. my friends. My friends. Ah! I can't!
^Hey! Stay with me! Where does it hurt? Please, talk to us!
^WHY WON'T YOU EAT? EAT! EAT OR DIE!

evil: ^YES. THE BRACELETS. YOUR HAND WRAPS AROUND THE FOUR OF THEM, STILL IN YOUR POCKET. WEAR THEM. FEAST.

c-1: ^WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU ARE? YOU'VE KNOWN WHAT YOU WERE GOING TO DO THE ENTIRE TIME. YOU ESCAPED THAT BLUBBERING FOOL FOR A SECOND TIME. YOU WILL EAT. YOU WILL LIKE IT.

feast: ^I'm... okay. It was a weird cramp. I think the bracelets are a good idea. Here, one for each of us.
^Oh... as long as you're o-okay. Yay!!
^Mine is the best, no offense. See the beads I used?
^Yeah, right, check mine out. This is totally better. Hey, Liam? You okay over there? Liam?
^I-I can't move. I can't move. I can't move!
^I know where we just came from was scary, but you're safe now. You're freaking out. Come here--
^I can't move either. Everything is locking up. This is so... ugh! What is this? Liam, calm down!
^I CAN'T M-MOVE! I'M N-N-NOT CALM! WHY CAN YOU MOVE? WHAT'S WRONG WITH ME?
^No. No way. No no no no. Why can you move?
^I want you to know... this isn't personal. I can't help what I am. I have to eat. I HAVE to.
^No-- go away! Leave us alone! BACK U--
^AHHHHH. FOR ALL THE UNPLEASANTRIES, FOR ALL THE SACRIFICE... WHAT A TERRIFIC MEAL.
stop: ^Oh! The b-bracelets! Why did you throw them? I can go grab them--
^NO! Liam, no. Don't touch them. Please.
^What's going on with you? Where are you hurt? You're curling up in pain.
^Leave. Now. Please don't ask me anything else. I'm-- I'm not what you think I am.
^I-I'm scared. Someone should run the rest of the way and g-g-get a doctor. Or--
^You... that crazy guy was telling the truth? That one of us is a... a monster?

^Please. I'm sorry. I can't help what I am. But I don't want to hurt you. When I was looking for you all in that house... I was so scared. I've never felt that way. I'm tired of living like this. But you need to go before I--
^Right. Liam. Alex. We have to run again. Don't look back. Actually, Alex, grab Liam.
^This is insane. Liam, stop fighting. Let's go! Now!
^WHERE HAS THIS LEFT YOU, FOOL? HUNGRY. STARVING! AND ALONE. YOU WILL DIE NOW, DO YOU REALIZE THAT?
^I know. I know. But I've... hurt so many people. So many who called me friend. And I'm so tired. I want to sleep now.
